results.title: Metformin Improves the Senescence of Renal Tubular Epithelial Cells in a High-Glucose State Through E2F1
results.text_hl: Thus, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ alleviates high-glucose-induced senescence and @DISEASE_Fibrosis @DISEASE_MESH:D005355 @@@fibrosis@@@ of @<m>DISEASE_Glycosuria_Renal</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006030 @@@renal@@@ tubular epithelial cells by downregulating the expression of @GENE_E2F1 @GENE_13555 @@@E2F1@@@.

results.title: Metformin reduces insulin resistance and attenuates progressive renal injury in prepubertal obese Dahl salt-sensitive rats.
results.text_hl: At the end of the protocol, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ prevented the @<m>DISEASE_Glycosuria_Renal</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006030 @@@renal@@@ hyperfiltration observed in SSLepRmutant rats versus SS rats.

citations.NLM: Ekperikpe US, Mandal S, Holt SJ, Daniels JK, Johnson TD, Cooper JS, Safir SM, Cornelius DC, Williams JM. results.title: Glycaemic Control and Weight Reduction: A Narrative Review of New Therapies for Type 2 Diabetes
results.text_hl: Thus, in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with a higher cardiovascular @<m>DISEASE_Glycosuria_Renal</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006030 @@@and renal@@@ risk profile, current guidelines encourage early treatment with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ together with glucagon-like peptide-1 receptor agonists (GLP-1 RAs) and sodium-glucose co-transporter-2 inhibitors with proven cardiovascular benefit.

citations.NLM: Vázquez LA, Romera I, Rubio-de Santos M, Escalada J. Glycaemic Control and Weight Reduction: A Narrative Review of New Therapies for Type 2 Diabetes Diabetes Ther. 2023 Sep 15;():. PMID: 37713104

results.title: Metformin mitigates renal dysfunction in obese insulin-resistant rats via activation of the AMPK/PPARalpha pathway.
results.text_hl: Interestingly, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ demonstrated greater efficacy than @CHEMICAL_Gemfibrozil @CHEMICAL_MESH:D015248 @@@gemfibrozil@@@ in attenuating @<m>DISEASE_Glycosuria_Renal</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006030 @@@renal lipotoxicity@@@ through the @GENE_PRKAA2 @GENE_78975 @@@AMPK@@@-regulated @GENE_SREBF1 @GENE_78968 @@@SREBP1@@@/@GENE_FASN @GENE_50671 @@@FAS@@@ signaling pathway.

results.title: Activating AMP-activated protein kinase (AMPK) slows renal cystogenesis.
results.journal: Proc Natl Acad Sci U S A
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ induces significant arrest of cystic growth in both in vitro and ex vivo models of @<m>DISEASE_Glycosuria_Renal</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006030 @@@renal cystogenesis@@@.

results.title: [Effect of fenofibrate and metformin on lipotoxicity in OLETF rat kidney].

results.text_hl: OBJECTIVE: To explore the possible molecular mechanism of abnormal @<m>DISEASE_Glycosuria_Renal</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006030 @@@renal@@@ lipid metabolism in OLETF @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@, and the effects of @CHEMICAL_Fenofibrate @CHEMICAL_MESH:D011345 @@@fenofibrate@@@ or @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ on @<m>DISEASE_Glycosuria_Renal</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006030 @@@renal@@@ local lipid metabolism.

results.title: [The use of drugs in chronic renal insufficiency: primum non nocere! (First do not harm!). The paradigmatic cases of azathioprine, metformin and denosumab].
results.text_hl: As paradigmatic, we will discuss here the case of @CHEMICAL_Azathioprine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001379 @@@azathioprine@@@, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Denosumab @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069448 @@@denosumab@@@ use, when @<m>DISEASE_Glycosuria_Renal</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006030 @@@renal@@@ function is heavily decreased.

results.title: Acute metformin intoxication: 2012 experience of Emergency Departement of Lodi, Italy.
results.text_hl: Damage due to @<m>DISEASE_Glycosuria_Renal</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006030 @@@renal hypoperfusion@@@ or the direct toxic effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ should be considered.

results.title: Dapagliflozin, metformin XR, or both: initial pharmacotherapy for type 2 diabetes, a randomised controlled trial.
results.text_hl: Each trial had three arms: @CHEMICAL_dapagliflozin @CHEMICAL_MESH:C529054 @@@dapagliflozin@@@ plus @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, @CHEMICAL_dapagliflozin @CHEMICAL_MESH:C529054 @@@dapagliflozin@@@ monotherapy and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ monotherapy.
